name: NextMind Dev Kit Interactive Review
description:
This is the first review from Prans Lab!

It was made with GB Studio and you can play it on your browser or download the ROM to play it on an actual Game Boy (or an emulator)! 

YouTube trailer below:


The review is about the NextMind dev kit, a brain-computer interface that has recently been released for developers to create experiences with. You can find out how some demos look like on Prans Lab's YouTube channel:

HOW TO PLAY:

The "gameplay" is a point-and-click one and you'll find the control scheme to play on your browser below:

  • Up - Up Arrow / W  
  • Down - Down Arrow / S  
  • Left - Left Arrow / A  
  • Right - Right Arrow / D  
  • A - Alt / Z / J  
  • B - Ctrl / K / X  

Hope you enjoy it and please do share any bugs that you might encounter!

And keep on discovering!

- Prans
